dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC 2012 database contains 20 foreground object classes as well as one background class, providing a benchmark for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset contains 2975 images annotated with quality pixel-wise annotations of 18 object classes and one background class, aimed at semantic urban scene understanding.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
